text: Yesli My dadim yemu vkusit' milost' ot Nas posle togo, kak yego kosnetsya neschast'ye, to on nepremenno skazhet: «Vot eto - dlya menya, i ya ne dumayu, chto nastanet Chas. Yesli zhe ya budu vozvrashchen k moyemu Gospodu, to u Nego dlya menya obyazatel'no budet ugotovano nailuchsheye». My nepremenno povedayem neveruyushchim o tom, chto oni sovershili, i dadim im vkusit' zhestokiye mucheniya
